original_title: Talking Heads: Rock Pop in Concert
overview: Adrian Belew augments the band on this 50-minute performance from the Westfalenhalle, in Dortmund, Germany, on December 20th, 1980, for the Rockpop TV show.  Set List:  Psycho Killer  Cities  I Zimbra  Once In A Lifetime  Animals  Crosseyed And Painless  Life During Wartime  The Great Curve
title: Talking Heads: Rock Pop in Concert
